title: "Lula, the best president the Brazilians have ever had in their entire history"
description:
(Dutch subtitles) Belgian Dutch language independent news site www.dewereldmorgen.be ('the world tomorrow') interviews Brian Mier, translator of 'Lula - A Biography' by Fernando Morais, about the book, about Lula's successes and failures in his third presidential mandate. Time codes:

00:00   Most people believe he's the best president the Brazilians have ever had
00:07   Introduction
01:08   About the book, Brazilian history, the dictatorship, Lula's prison sentence
10:31   Domestic popularity, successes, failures working with majority right wing parliament
17:52   Non-aligned foreign policy, BRICS, China, Trump, Venezuela
19:48   Trump wil attempt a coup d'Ã©tat against Lula
23:07   Lula is the best president Brazilians have ever had
